pullrequest.title: Wrap visual studio pragmas in ifdef's (#20)

content.raw:
I was trying to get a more elegant solution so we don't need to write three lines every time we need to use a pragma. I started the work in  c091560 but we should check that clang and MSVC are happy with this approach. It's difficult if we don't require the user of the ignition code to use a compiler flag.

For now, we can merge the pull request.
